channel.title: PowerShell on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: Assigning a built-in role to the group at resource group scope level using PowerShell scripts
item.description: This article is focused on the following 4 sections: Creating new resource group, Fetching User Object Id, Creating an azure AD group with the user using user’s object Id, Assigning a built in ‘Reader’ role to the group at resource group scope level

item.title: Add Developer PowerShell and Developer Command Prompt for Visual Studio to Windows Terminal
item.description: Windows Terminal is great, I use it for all my command line work.
